definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: Saraa, etc. (cf. also Lag:BN 85), in the Shephelah of Judah (TelAm.Ṣarḫa, named with Aialuna, Ajalon);—Jos 15:33, but assigned to Da 19:41; Ju Jdg 13:2, Jdg 13:25, Jdg 16:31, Jdg 18:2, Jdg 18:8, Jdg 18:11, 2Ch 11:10, Ne 11:29; mod. Ṣar‘a, 15 miles W. from Jerus., cf. GASm:Geogr. 218 Buhl:Geogr.195.
